list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a solid or hollow object which tapers from a circular or roughly circular base to a point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: stalls selling paper cones full of fresh berries
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quầy hàng bán nón đầy quả mọng tươi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the dry fruit of a conifer, typically tapering to a rounded end and formed of a tight array of overlapping scales on a central axis which separate to release the seeds.
a light-sensitive cell of one of the two types present in the retina of the eye, responding mainly to bright light and responsible for sharpness of vision and color perception.
